commit_message: Updated README: added instructions for downloading the sra-toolkit from NCBI.
Updated Makefile: fixed root path variable to reflect current working directory.
Included micromamba/conda environment file in yaml format.
Updated README: added documentation for the usage of the 'blast' command.
Updated Makefile: added 'blast' command for querying contigs against a virus genome database.
Updated README: added instructions for creating a conda environment.
Updated metadata: added sample output directory structure
Updated README: added documentation for passing in parameters when running the Makefile.
Added first Makefile iteration, along with custom scripts.
